inlineContent.text: This page lists which Usd types are and are not Sendable.
It is generated based on heuristics that look at the source code for OpenUSD, and may have errors. If you spot a mistake, please let me know!
DocC does not automatically list that a type is explicitly non-Sendable, so use this page as the source of truth for whether a type is Sendable or not.
In Swift 6 mode, you should get compiler errors if you try to use an explicitly non-Sendable type from OpenUSD as if it were Sendable. You can try using
to downgrade the error to a warning. If that doesnâ€™t work, you can completely suppress the diagnostic with
